Mapcolonies : Links of CSW catalog item

Created by Alex Lebinson, last modified on Mar 03, 2022

When querying PYCSW record(s) response XML may contain <mc:links> element(s) in following format

<mc:links scheme="WMTS_LAYER" name="bluemarble_5km" description="">

http://TILE_SERVER_URL/wmts/bluemarble_5km/{TileMatrixSet}/{TileMatrix}/{TileCol}/{TileRow}.png

</mc:links>

Different scheme values:

Scheme

Description

WMTS_LAYER

Direct layer consumption URL

XYZ_LAYER

Direct layer consumption URL

3D_LAYER

Direct layer consumption URL

WMTS

Layer WMTS capabilities link

WMS

Layer WMS capabilities link

WCS

Layer WCS capabilities link

THUMBNAIL_S

Layer SMALL thumbnail image link

THUMBNAIL_M

Layer MEDIUM thumbnail image link

THUMBNAIL_L

Layer LARGE thumbnail image link
